page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: THE ARTS CENTRE Within the arts centre there is the theatre, the ballroom and the gallery. In the theatre visiting companies perform plays and musical recitals. Several local drama and music groups also use the hall for their performances. The Shoestring company and Shakespeare Players also use the theatre. In the ballroom dances are held, it is frequently used for discos or parties. In the gallery art work is often exhibited, sometimes that of local artists. AMATEUR COMPANIES There are several amateur companies in Stamford which give annual performances in the town. These include: The Gilbert & Sullivan society The town band.
